snippet: An attack on Wednesday targeted the Afghan intelligence agency in one of the most heavily guarded areas of Kabul.
abstract: Heavily armed Taliban attackers in minivans packed with explosives strike headquarters of Afghan intelligence agency in Kabul, escalating conflict between two entities.

byline.contributor: Sangar Rahimi and Jawad Sukhanyar contributed reporting from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: An attack on Wednesday targeted the Afghan intelligence agency in one of the most heavily guarded areas of Kabul.

headline.seo: Afghan Spy Agency’s Home Is Attacked by Taliban
headline.main: Taliban Escalate Battle With Afghan Spy Agency in Assault on Its Headquarters
headline.print_headline: Taliban Escalate Battle With Afghan Spy Agency in Assault on Its Headquarters
